TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed BodyTypeType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: The enumeration specifies the item body type.

remarks.para: This enumeration is used to either designate the body type during a request or to determine what type of body is returned in a response.

example.para: The following example shows you how the enumeration is used to designate an HTML body type for a message.
The enumeration is the type that is used to set the property on a object.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype ExchangeWebServices.BodyTypeType HTML = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Identifies the item body as HTML content.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype ExchangeWebServices.BodyTypeType Text = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Identifies the item body as plain text content.
